ygData.subject: Re: Cash flow problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a fairly easy and painless solution.  Go to Lesser Faydark and hunt the generic bandit camp.  You are already familiar with their tactics and I could
ygData.messageBody:
I have a fairly easy and painless solution. Go to Lesser Faydark and hunt
the generic bandit camp. You are already familiar with their tactics and I
could solo most of them at 11th and I only wear leather. If can't solo them
a partner shouldn't be hard to find and there isn't much dangerous walkin
about. You'll also be close to the best source for small banded if you
want, Greater faydark. I can make 20pp there in about 4hrs if its not too
crowded. Good luck!

Kitasi
The mournful bard of Faydwer on E'ci
"and no one shall work for money,
and no one shall work for fame"
"but each for the joy of the working,
and each to his separate star..."
